sensory_systems.name: Multi-Spectral Infrared (MSIR) Camera Array
sensory_systems.description: A dense array of MSIR cameras capable of simultaneously capturing temperature, moisture, and subtle color variations within the dough at multiple points throughout the process. Utilizes near-infrared light to penetrate the dough and analyze internal properties without disruption.

sensory_systems.name: Acoustic Sensors (Piezoelectric Arrays)
sensory_systems.description: Detects subtle vibrations and sound patterns within the mixer and dough itself, indicative of gluten development, air incorporation, and potential issues like overmixing or underdevelopment.

sensory_systems.name: Olfactory Sensors (Electronic Nose - e-Nose)
sensory_systems.description: Analyzes volatile organic compounds (VOCs) released from the dough, providing real-time information about fermentation progress, ingredient degradation, and final product aroma profiles.

technical_specifications.accuracy: ±5% concentration deviation for key aroma compounds

control_systems.name: Adaptive PID Control System with Reinforcement Learning
control_systems.description: A sophisticated control system utilizing PID control combined with reinforcement learning algorithms to dynamically adjust mixer speed, kneading time, and temperature based on sensory data feedback.  Learns optimal parameters for different dough recipes and conditions.

technical_specifications.accuracy: ±0.5% parameter deviation compared to target values

control_systems.name: Predictive Maintenance System (Sensor Fusion & Machine Learning)
control_systems.description: Monitors the health of all mechanical components using data from vibration sensors, temperature sensors, and current sensors. Predicts potential failures and schedules maintenance proactively.

mechanical_systems.name: Adaptive Mixing System (Variable Speed/Torque Mixer)
mechanical_systems.description: A mixer with multiple independently controlled mixing arms capable of adjusting speed and torque in real-time based on sensor feedback. Includes a self-leveling mechanism to maintain consistent dough distribution.

mechanical_systems.name: Automated Dough Shaping System (Robotic Arm with Force Sensors)
mechanical_systems.description: A robotic arm equipped with force sensors and a flexible end-effector for shaping loaves, rolls, and other bread forms with precision.

software_integration.name: Centralized AI Orchestration Platform
software_integration.description: A cloud-based platform integrating all sensor data, control algorithms, and machine learning models. Provides a user interface for recipe management, process monitoring, and anomaly detection.

software_integration.name: Digital Twin Simulation Engine
software_integration.description: A real-time simulation of the entire breadmaking process, allowing for experimentation with different parameters and optimizing production for various goals (e.g., yield, quality, energy consumption).
